attributes.action: Regulate private companies who issue uninforcible Penalty Charge Notifications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regulation is needed to control unscrupulous companies issuing Penalty Charge Notices for parking and their subsequent letters sent threatening court action.
Their 'invoices' are designed to fool people into paying by using false claims and threats. 
British business is at an all time low when conmen are allowed to operate by deception and get away with it.
